TopicTitle: Thinking of starting tycoon flight sim mode with funds.

Articles.Content:
Thinking about starting the actual tycoon part of the game & was wondering what buildings should i upgrade first with out making my Space agency Broke?  Also Trying life support & crew R&R mod & unmanned before manned.

Edited August 15, 2018 by Cloakedwand72

The launch pad (for increased launch mass) & mission control (for more contracts) are pretty cheap upgrades for starters.  The tracking station (with mission control) are needed for patched conics & maneuver nodes in map view.  Getting a Mun encounter without conics or maneuver nodes isn't too bad, but Minmus is pretty difficult.  R&D is vital to progress, but is just about the most expensive to upgrade.  VAB is pretty expensive too, but can wait a little bit - it's amazing what you can build with only 30 parts.  SPH & runway are usually last for me.

Can you make a Snacks™ truck to park outside the Astronaut Complex, please?

That should raise Funds™ pretty quickly.*

 

 

*not really. Is joke.

I promote any sandbox player that wants to start a career.

I did it and somehow, having to pay real kerbal bucks for my horrible crashes leaves me satisfied.

 

O, and stay away from the Mun, the money is in the orbital space tourist business contracts.

 

And make sure you invest money and rep into science.

 

That should cover it.
